channel.title: My First Computers
channel.description: So, at the risk of starting one of those annoying meme's, I've kinda had this conversation with a few folks before and people of my age always seem to enjoy it so here goes.  My first computers. My First Computer...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Dmytro Lapshyn+00:00
item.description:
Oh yes, using every available piece of squared paper to draw game sprites!
So true...did that millions of times in my school years. Then, when I was fed up with binary math, I wrote a simple sprite editor in BASIC :)
item.dc:creator: Dmytro Lapshyn
